div.p: If a tumor observation's Observation.hasMember field contains a referrence to a 'Tumor Satellite' observation, then it is a satellite tumor. The tumor that it is a satellite of is called the index tumor.
The 'Tumor Satellite' observation may contain a reference to the index tumor observation in the derivedFrom element.
The 'Tumor Satellite' observation may contain a distance to the index tumor in the value element.
This graph provides an overview of this profile, and its dependencies.
Click on any of the elements of the graph to go to a section describing that element.
